Hmm.. Yes, well Zardus was in a bad mood and accidently nuked all 
your chars, and then a jigglypuff landed and destroyed the planet 
(kidding). Not much actually. There's still the shaky cease-fire at 
the CF, and Darkfate is asking DrillBit something.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> OOC: Ok, I'm back from my moms house. Could someone please tell me
> anything important that has happaned, and where my chars are, and 
what
> they are doing? Thanks.
